about

I'm Severyn Kozak, a software engineer and computer science major at MIT. This site is both a lightweight portfolio and tech blog that I use to document my (mis)adventures in programming. I spend my free time hacking on various captivating projects, learning as much as possible, and enjoying the little things. Check out my posts, resume, or get in touch.
